pullrequest.title: merging into dev and a few fixes

content.html:
CMakeLists.txt

37: spelling mistake "ot"

gazebo/physics/Link.cc

403: Rename function to ::GetChildJointsLinks()

416: Rename function to ::GetParentJointsLinks()

gazebo/physics/Link.hh

289: 

/// \brief Returns a vector of links that are connected to this link via child joints.
/// \return A vector of Link, where each Link is connected to this via a child joint.

Make GetParentLinks function match in style and content.

These functions should also use the Link_V typedef.

gazebo/physics/Model.cc

554: A child of a model is not guaranteed to be a link. Need to use: 

    if (this->GetChild(j)->HasType(Base::LINK))

test/regression/set_joint.cc

There are no test hooks.

test/regression/set_pose.cc

There are no test hooks.

test/regression/set_pose_loop.cc

There are no test hooks.
